columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in the service
columns.Name: DeviceId

columns.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device
columns.Name: DeviceName

columns.Description: MAC address of the network adapter
columns.Name: MacAddress

columns.Description: Operational status of the network adapter
columns.Name: NetworkAdapterStatus

columns.Description: Tunneling protocol, if the interface is used for this purpose, for example 6to4, Teredo, ISATAP, PPTP, SSTP, and SSH
columns.Name: TunnelType

columns.Description: Networks that the adapter is connected to. Each JSON element in the array contains the network name, category (public, private or domain), a description, and a flag indicating if it’s connected publicly to the internet
columns.Name: ConnectedNetworks

columns.Description: DNS server addresses in JSON array format
columns.Name: DnsAddresses

columns.Description: Default gateway addresses in JSON array format
columns.Name: DefaultGateways

columns.Description: JSON array containing all the IP addresses assigned to the adapter, along with their respective subnet prefix and the IP class (RFC 1918 & RFC 4291)
columns.Name: IPAddresses

columns.Description: Event identifier based on a repeating counter.To identify unique events, this column must be used in conjunction with the DeviceName and Timestamp columns.
columns.Name: ReportId

columns.Description: Name of the manufacturer or vendor of the network adapter
columns.Name: NetworkAdapterVendor
